73870.summary: Some customers in the Kensington-Cedar Cottage area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
73870.title: Mar 7 - Vancouver (Kensington-Cedar Cottage) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

73872.title: Mar 7 - Burnaby (Cariboo) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
